comment.body: "In ZeroNet.conf you'll want to add your ipv6 to the ip_external section." Do I choose this address freely? I have no IPv6 network here, but it should work anyway.

Dear Kaffie, 

please help me out. I fail at step 2: Two questions: 

1. Do I rename to "Bootstrapped" or "bootstrapped" ? The original name is capitalized.
2. How do I get my IPv6 when I am in a IP4 network ?

> [noauth](#comment_1_1BAm9hGiRAMbYThSHbiFNJ5zeNdf6Qo7Hd): ifconfig | grep "inet6 fc" command returns your cjdns ipv6 address. Or alternatively you can find it in your  cjdroute.conf file after "ipv6":

Thanks! You mean ifconfig | grep "inet6 addr: fc", the tun0 (tunnel) interface?
OK the problem must be something in my workplace network. At home the procedure works...
